headline: Iran Escalation Shock Triggers Risk-Off Move To USD And Gold, Oil, Defense And Aerospace Win
summary: Iran conflict escalations are driving risk-off moves in stocks, crypto, oil, airlines, and defense.

raw.headline: Iran Escalation Shock Triggers Risk-Off Move To USD And Gold, Oil, Defense And Aerospace Win

headline: United Airlines Expands MileagePlus With New Canadian Co Branded Card
summary: United Airlines Holdings and Neo Financial have launched the United MileagePlus Neo World Elite Mastercard for Canadian customers. The new co branded credit card targets travelers who want to earn MileagePlus miles on everyday spending in Canada. The card is part of a wider effort to grow United's loyalty reach and deepen partnerships linked to United and Star Alliance travel. United Airlines Holdings, ticker NasdaqGS:UAL, is extending its MileagePlus program into Canada with a product that...

headline: Airspace closure halts many Middle East flights after attacks
summary: Airlines canceled 868 flights into Middle East countries on Saturday, according to aviation data firm Cirium.

raw.headline: Airspace closure halts many Middle East flights after attacks
